string.text: Here the passage is forbidden, Stalker.
I need to get back.
But it is impossible!\nBut if you really want... you can. For example, over five hundred money.
Here you go.
Now listen to me. You pretend to but mosquitoes and butterflies there is nothing fluttered. And then - not obessud.
Keep on here! Don't be too long until we are good.
I have no money.
Then go for a walk, where they came from. I have more to come. And decides to sneak quietly - like a dog shoot.
Bullseye, you would go from here... Not going well will help as we can.

Healthy! What do you want?
You our then senior wanted to see. But that doesn't mean you're welcome here. Walk, do not delay.
Hello, brother.
Explorer, I need to see my Doctor.
Look... do You know about the Doctor?
I was sent by the Ghost. Help me to urgently contact a Doctor.
So would immediately and said.\nthe Doctor in the cache Arrow group. If you're who they say they are the place I know.
Thank you.
Hello, brother.
Don't tell me about this place?

Here is the road in the Area. To go to the checkpoint and catch the eye of the soldiers advise that they have orders to shoot at our brother without warning. On the way to the North is the ruined bridge, but there is also a stationary roadblock. In the open here, dogs run in packs, beginners to go there dangerously. Sometimes mutants wander.
And like soldiers at the bridge to be? Because you need to go further.

So there are two options. First: if you fall on duty Kuznetsov, so he loves money. You see, and miss. Well, if you have a tight finances or someone else is on duty, then there is a workaround. Go left of the bridge along a railway embankment - the main thing is, I see that they didn't see you there! There you will see a small tunnel that passes under the embankment. And yet - mind you, there are zombies sometimes roam.
And that farther to the North, beyond the checkpoint?
Dump out there is what... Dark place. Sometimes due to fonyaschih garbage can not pass.
Hey, buddy. Wolf we've already been warned. Any Further questions are available?
Yes. How many bandits in the camp?

The person seven-eight. Two in the gate area, two in the right building at a fire, two in the building on the left - there is a Nimble keep. The court has occasionally someone wanders... and so, like, everything. Well, let's start praying?
Let's start. Raise their.
No. He'll try to hustle to raise.
Well. If anything, scream... Rambo, damn it.
So shoot so shoot... I Think the Wolf will be pleased.
Still not all put! Search for these monsters, get them!..
Well, man, you got given! Taken, and all killed, we have nothing left. If he did not see - would not believe! Steep, steep, tree-stick!..
Well, where piles of defeated enemies? Oh, you! Able nothing, except how to talk... get out of here!
Sorry, mate, only you would go now with the world here, huh? I'm waiting for one person...
I have a couple of questions.
Okay, go ahead.
What can you tell about the Area?

Well, you know! There are several days will not be enough, but my time is not cheap! Yes and no from me now...\nwill Introduce you briefly up to speed, and then he understands. The dump is three kilometers North from here - a place where almost all the radioactive trash from the station took. The stronger the radiation, the anomalies of the knee; as a consequence, artifacts too much... not very valuable, really. Beware of the bandits and greyhounds with patrols of "Debt". To the West of the Landfill - area research Institute "agriculture". In terms of artifacts, the place could suck, so what to do there is nothing special. And to the East of the Dark valley. Fig knows... weird there. Kind and quiet, is it just trash like the bandits enough. Only not so simple as it seems, I can smell it. Well, then dump in the territory of the plant "germ" - the heart of stalkerstva. There are a lot of experienced guys will meet you more and talk.
I changed my mind. Thank you.
Thank you.\nnow, I'm listening.
The dealer said that you have information about the shooter.

And that is they all last interested? Well, to say that I know him personally - so you lie. The experience of "communication", however, some are: the group of my guys fired. No one was hurt - they clearly others were waiting, so then dispersed peacefully. Have panaterri each other across the ravine, and left. Gray, my brother, now in a hangar at the Dump - I will send you coordinates to communicate. He knows more about the shooter.\noutlet be careful - there's a bunch of bandits settled. By the way, here for me the mutants are coming and I don't think that they calmed down. Help me to shoot? One-two - the whole business...
Thanks for the info, I will consider.
Stalker kit! Give first aid kit!
On, hold on.
I have no kits. Sorry.
Hey, buddy, you got me twice already rescued, and I do not forget those things. Get it here... so rich!
Thank you.
You our then senior wanted to see. But that doesn't mean you're welcome here. Walk, do not delay.
Wait, Bullseye! Now in the camp no one with you!
Why?
Well this is how you have to be an idiot to with the passenger of the "death truck" to shoot the breeze! You prove first that you can be.
What is the "death truck"? Don't remember anything... I don't remember.
Who knows... but the rare stuff, not much worse than this happens...\nDo not with you on this subject to talk! Let this superstition, and only you, Spot, better back off right wait.
What to do to believe me?
Let the Dealer check, and we observe. If you are a normal for the trunk not enough and generally are friends with the head, then a common language will always find, don't worry.
Okay, so be it.
Hi, Tagged. What do you need?
Listen, Bullseye, how are you by the way! We help great need.
Keep going.

I'm a Fan, after the Wolf left here for senior. Yesterday came a few mercenaries... serious guys, the devil... Came and ran the full program, saying that the day of the deadline - the camp clean, it is now their base is. Today they have come again, and the conversation, as you know, this time will not end.
And what did you decide?

We decided to ambush them to arrange, because in the forehead, I am afraid, will not survive. They are equipped with what is necessary, and the battle tactics you know about-go-go... And then the boys. In General, decided to sit quietly at home - like as we went, and as the opportunity arises, attack. We are soldiers just like you, now Oh how is not enough. And after the battle pans out, for us not rust! Now are you gonna help?
Help.

I propose to spend the remaining time to prepare for battle. Here's the plan. The greenest newbies I home-basements dispersed to the order of the nose not to stick - and then put the boys nor the tail of the dog... and we're still a couple of guys that serious, get sector to the shelling of the area around the fire. How are they to fire fit, we'll let that soak in from all sides!.. They are from the bridge will be... should be soon. So look for shelter with good sector, and my team and start. Well, no, you, of course, see itself only in the open, I think, to survive the odds a little. You decide.
Well.
No, I'm not ready yet.
Sorry. A great fighter like you, we would be very useful. Will have their own...
Waiting for these beauties. Feel soon will attend.
Yes, you are a terrible man, Bullseye! You better on the road not to get caught.
There is a little.
Here you go from us into memory.\nAND again - thank you so much for your help. We saved the young are Labeled.
Healthy, Bullseye, good to see you!
And Hello to you.
By the way, where is the Wolf gone?

He's got recently received from one of the stalkers held some kind of message, immediately gathered, grabbed a box of dynamite and rushed into the Zone. I just got back from injury was oklemalsya the Cordon, he asked me to look after the young.
I have some questions.
Ask, I will try to help.
Thank you.
What do you know about the Area?
Know a lot of things. Ask more specifically.
In the center of the Zone?

Yeah, the topic... I had two years to find the answer trying! Only the path to the center, so that to return alive, was never found. A few times with friends trying to break. He barely returned, and friends - not all...\nAsk what we're at all useful? The dream climbed. The desires to fulfill.
Dreams come true?

There is a beautiful legend about the Artist desires. There seems to be in the center zone of the place where performed any, even the most incredible, whim. Only you know what I say? I know that in the center Zone to the guys chances to die, and By this I do not believe. Do not risk in vain. I do not advise.
Where did the Area?
Here again boomed in 2006, she appeared. Know that the answer is not pull. Only a few people know the truth, if ever there are any.
What brings you to the Area?

I worked at mine, so it was closed as unprofitable. Money - a zero, no prospects. And there were rumors that the Area can be fabulously rich. Some experience I had, so I decided to take a chance. Can't say that rich, however the money really wound up. Yes, it's the usual story, so many here were...
What is the most dangerous in the Area?

It's hard to say. There are so many dangerous and unknown, that simply is not possible to face. And without that is enough. I am now the "flesh" on her toe bitten off the hair from the radiation began to crumble, "Hot" right leg made of... bad thing is "Roasting". And once nose to nose with the bloodsucker has faced - at least not to remember... well, you can talk all you want, only until you have this case on myself - hell understand. In short, the Council is only one caution. Always and everywhere.
Have you heard anything about the shooter?

It seems that Stalker of cool. I personally do not know - well, I have long been close to the center did not climb, and here, on the outskirts, mostly just green roam. Find someone who is constantly in the depth Zone have been, talk to him.
What do you know about the "trucks of death"?

Do not know and do not want to know!\nI'm Sorry, I know all about you... Too from this mysticism rushing. And in these parts live with a month - for life superstitious will become, like it or not. Dead body, dead behind the wheel... Who, where, why? One hope, though not from the world.
Hi. Why did you come?
Hi. I need Quick. Can you tell me where to find it?

With Nimble bad thing happened Here near his group of bandits attacked, and Nimble took with him, he only had to throw the SOS. His companions seem to have covered. The guys said that the criminals now in the old ATP that way.
You their not rescues from captivity? Not friendly somehow... Or weak?

Oh, I ought to beat you, but good?.. It's not so simple. People I have little, and they sploshnyakom beginners. I can't risk it. If we have this camp will lose all normal stalkers it will be bad. But what about yourself? If you do not chicken out, help will not refuse, not proud. So, to help the mob deal?

No, so you figure can handle. My scouts are fighters that is necessary. Now they are just those freaks graze. Together, you, in principle, have a good chance. So what? Or still weak?
I'll try it.
Respect! Here's just in case first aid kit and bandage, hopefully, not need. The coordinates of the guys I'm thrown off. About you now warned.
Not weak. But I won't.
So, after a little... Well, go to hell!
Well, how's it going?
Put your boys in order on the ATP.
Man, that's great! Here you go - from me personally.
I've gone through ATP. It's already picked clean.
Wow! The guys say you give the heat what you need! Here, have some money... so, in memory, not counting the huge gratitude. Besides, I have something else...
Great.
In the process.
Keep me posted, okay?
Can't chat right now. Fuck off.
Understood, not the fool.
Hi, Tagged. What brings you here?

There's not much to tell... ATP the bandits were, had a little clean up. And so, like, that's all.

This is thanks, brother! That's helped out! Don't even know how to thank you...
Look, I need a flash drive need that you gave to the Merchant. It?

There is such a thing... these boobies and search really do not know how. Ah, well, take! You tell me, after all, a life saved. She was securely hidden, and the bulls even really to search are not able
Thank you. And where have you been hiding her? You never know - it might come in useful when.

Not below the belt, don't worry. I've been on Dealer work to hide the old Kazan! By the way, I bulls told about a cache of artifacts, so they are a go. A cache, there really has only artifact there is only one. If you want, I'll give you the coordinates.
Road velvet, Stalker!
But come on.
Don't forget: there all the beasts much. And the guy who went there too, not with a shovel, so be careful. Thanks, man.
And thank you.
But not for that. Good luck!
The job is done. Here's the box from the checkpoint.

Here molodchaga! Nada. Although, of course, a "thank you" cannot eat... So, here's five... or, no, six thousand mnt and we're even!\nby the Way, Solda in fact missing find sure - so here kipezh will start... So get out of here quickly at high speed.
Special missions are there?
No, nothing.

In General, here's the thing... On a post from the depths of the Zone gave the box with the report of one of the expeditions that the North went. Day guarding him like he is filled with pure plutonium, and at night somehow the two guards leave.
Keep going.
Quietly make your way to the checkpoint should one remove for me this box. As an option can commander blogpost to talk. And I never regret it... within reason. Take, no?
I'll try.
Well, I'm a money cooking, you're Labeled, have never been let down. Only this... don't make a commotion, okay? And we all here the sky is the limit seem, if the warriors offense.
No. While the brothers won't.
Come on, what are you? There is not a checkpoint, and the name of one! A dozen conscripts with half-drunk ensign!.. Okay. But I'm with you, Bullseye, incidentally, is strongly expected.
Bullseye, I was thinking at leisure and have something to offer You, by and large, you need to look for the shooter, right?
For example.

On the other hand, all will be well: you will kill his hand, but at the same time and find out what happened to you. And I... well, I mean, your benefits from our cooperation get laid too. Huh? Okay?

Yes, serious man you are, I can tell. We need these people. We\nwith other merchants here carry out one investigation. Want to find the way North to the center of the Zone, but there is someone or something interferes with the passage. Fuck knows how your Shooter was able to slip... you Know, there's one place where my brain boils. Scary... Yes... But more to the point. Those boys who with turntables put, watching the military there. And, apparently, warriors in the building of former research Institute "agriculture" found something. Very serious something. I think it has something to do with the center of the Zone. So: all that the military dug, yet it lies somewhere on the third floor of the Institute building. Guarded, of course, where do without it... but it us a great choice. Understand what I mean?
Think I got it.
Once released with the production of "Agricultural industry", immediately bring it to the Bartender. He runs things in the Stalker bar "100 x-ray" is in the territory of the former factory "Rostock".
Understood.

Coordinates the necessary info and I'll upload to PDA. But if to explain in words, so go North through the garbage, and then turn West, and after a couple of kilometres will see "Agriculture". The Dump artifacts, by the way, like mushrooms after the rain, although the ground is also in full. So I advise you to buy from me antirad or vodka. And then you'll glow like a Christmas tree... hehe. Humor animator! Well, good luck.

Well... yeah... But it's very interesting! Tell - do not believe. Hmm... yeah... about as! You see! I didn't know this... how it all started... Well, okay. Hold back. That's all you need to give the Bartender, and for your trouble is due!

Wait. Here, take the gun and ammo. Are you without a weapon in the Area at the time will be gone! By the way, when you dragged, you have your knife was. I cleaned it up, and you never know - suddenly, you have a bad head? Now I see that everything seems normal, so get your property back.
Thank you.
Well Labeled? In our business nothing has moved?
Then, choose how we'll proceed: either I'm brain I'm going to soar, as usually all beginners make, either as an experienced Stalker, get a job, and go.

The situation was clarified.

So until you bring, to tell us about. Got that?
Bullseye, I've already told him everything. Get out of here!
Well, Bullseye, what's new will tell?
I need answers to some questions.

Ask, just because I don't know. You know, I sit there for days and life - it's all out there in the Area. Can you tell me about the Area in General, and a little about the immediate vicinity of where he went.
Tell me in General terms about the Zone.
Ask.
What's in the Area doing the military?

Guard, what else! Whether the Zone itself, whether the rest of the world from it - is unclear. Here sometimes the whole of the expedition are looking for something...\nBut I'll tell you what. Military Zone is not respected, so it is their for it does not like. And then in zinc coffins being taken away. Well, what else to say... Looking down at everybody, as if the gods had patched. Stalkerskie the laws are not revered, to help will never come, at least in the eyes they will die. Can shoot - Yes, easily, not punish them for it... But someone I found a common language. You need the vodka, there are different magazines to get somewhere? Well, you know what I mean. But in vain they do not Zli - whisk will not notice.
Tell me about the Area.

Area... It's, you know, not just a circle in how many kilometers in diameter with its center at the nuclear plant... It's something strange. Very strange. I know hardly anyone in our world will answer you on this question. I think the Area is actually not part of it. Individual, in itself, the world is a dangerous, weird, and devilishly attractive. Do you know why? Yes, because everyone here, if lucky, can get rich quick. The closer to the center of the Zone will make the way, the faster the money will rise.
How dangerous is this "separate world"?

Ahem... Yes, well, nothing - that's just to die here at every step. And not just from bullets stupid Solda, although the military is now a lot caught up... Death from a bullet is considered, the most pleasant death in the Area. But the anomaly is, you know... that kind of death - Yes, it's scary. They are even mutants side bypass. Speaking of mutants: this is also rare stuff, "children" Zones, so no weapons it is better not to go. In General, about any hazards better than other stalkers no one ever tells you.
How you can get rich?

Well, my friend, and how could you have made! Forgot?!\nArtifacts - that's the basis of everything. For all sorts of obscure toys from the Area with a Big Land ready to fork out a fortune. Artifacts more valuable than gold, diamonds and pure plutonium. Why? Yes, because no jewel in the world has such supernatural power and shares it with his master. I mean, come on: you hang up, say on the belt kind of crap - and the bullets begin to get you a party! What else? Well, every little thing can often be found even here, at hand. But for the valuable instances go closer to the center.
Does anyone know what is happening in the center of the Zone?

Yes, different talk. You then so much stuff to tell... I'm the only one in all this otherworldly stuff is not believe. That's what I do believe is that in the center of the Zone is full of valuable artifacts. Only people here who would be able to go back there, not yet met.
Don't know what happened to me?

Well, brother asked! Dark this thing, you know...\nFound you in the "death truck" - there are... trupovozki? From time to time of the Central Zone appear, loaded... Where you're going - nobody really knows. So one truck crashed, and you next found. And here is the thing - residually fact. Broken trupovozki found before, but living close to never... I'm Sorry, more I can not help. To understand you need yourself.
Who is the Shooter?

Yes, like there is such a Stalker. According to rumors, one of the few that the center of the Zone and went back. Although what legends about stalkers characters here we have plenty, so can't guarantee anything. In any case, I personally with him did not - see, he has his own channels for distribution... well, ask people in the Area - before you know it, someone tells.
A Stalker called Ghost?
Oh, that's another man-a legend.\na Long time nothing is heard about him. Probably vanished somewhere in the depths of the Zone.
What's around here?

Ah! Well, that's the dressing room Area. The army cordon. Relatively quiet, the military is sometimes fun, shakedown suggest. Experienced stalkers here in a rarity, only newcomers to stay, and who is and forever remains, hmm... That's very close, on the farm, the beginners camp is nestled. Look to pull the trigger they are also able, so you play nice in vain.\nWhat else? Well, the good swag here not find. The road - an abandoned factory of some sort. In the North, behind the railway embankment, remains of the farm and to the South checkpoint. By the way, some fighters have placed mines, so be careful. In the center of the bridge was, but knocked him down. That's, like, everything.

A few soldiers with orders to shoot without warning, therefore it is better to pass it by. If they hurt, you can call the forces from the far cordon. Those upstairs shakedown this will bring that I have a month no customers... Commander soltow know a little: he loves the collar to lay. That is thanks to him and stay here for a while.

Yes, there are two steps in a northerly direction immediately and see. Before there's a bridge over the road was, and then went and fell during one of the emissions. There is a military post made and it seems like no one is allowed... but if grease, it will miss. Generally it is better not to light up, unless heavily loaded or wounded.

As the road will go right in it and see - brick building. Stealing from there, it had been stolen, there was one box. A popular place for criminals. I don't know if they're there, but just in case be careful. You take, of course, is nothing... but it you have this confusion?

Yes, the attacks were... and ran into the gangsters. One of our immediately killed. Nimble with a dragged - he hung noodles that knows the cache with a bunch of artifacts. I pretended to be dead - that cost.
I need Nimble... Go for it. The company does not wish to be?

The bodies look... the guys from our group must be.
Little. I'll live. The Christmas tree is still on the vest is not accumulated. And without it deep into the Zone to go - dead room.
D-damn it, it sucks... die...

Phew...
Well, how are you?
Help me to improve relations with local communities.
Here's how! Well, who do you wanna be friends?
